reviews.review:
Du musst das Ei von Albert Stein Stein geleckt haben um die Level zu machen.
Fazit nach 16,1 Stunden Spielzeit:









Das Spiel soll weg von meinen Eiern
my pea brain got me stuck several times but it was all worth it, nice story and humor
Just finished the campaign I like dis, very funny
This is a very good game to play when your bored, and it really gets your brain working
After 10 Years, Portal 2 Still a 10/10 game
This game is astonishing. It has a wonderful story and is really fun to play. The puzzles can be frustrating but that's what makes it fun. This game was well thought out and I really enjoyed it

I'm not a puzzle gamer but it was still fun to play, however, I enjoyed story of the first game more.
I didn't get why some people see this as the best game ever.
Very fun game with great technical aspects. I really enjoyed it and it helped my brain with problem solving. Would highly recommend.
Fun puzzle game with your friends or by yourself
i would say its perfect but i have 0 friends.

Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado creo que la franquicia realmente explota todo su potencial con esta entrega, su primicia parece ser muy sencilla pero Portal 2 es de esos pocos juegos que puedes seguir explorando y encontrando muchos secretos.
Fun relaxing game to play between your Doom and Fallout sessions

good game 4.5/5 stars better than the first portal
One of the best and funniest games i have ever played, definitely would recommend

Yes but give me Portal 3 Valve

De los mejores juegos de Valve, es un juego divertido lleno de un humor inedito. Con una jugabilidad innovadora para el 2011.
Cansarse de el es dif√≠cil.
Jugar los mapas de comunidad es una gran experiencia.
Y el modo historia es simplemente arte.
Es un juego increible para el 2011, pudo haber salido este 2020 o 2021 y aun asi seria un juegazo.
Recomendadisimo al 100%
To those who never touched this one. Go for it.

A fantastic sequel to one of my favorite games, if you want a game to just relax, or even just play with a friend and relax while not knowing what to do, I would highly advise you to get portal 2, I just cannot stress this enough, this game is old but SO AMAZING

Amazing, Wonderful. 10/10. a classic. a shame I have no friends to play it with but the singleplayer is so much fun and I`m not even done yet. will update maybe if I change my mind. This game has so many fun puzzles and builds upon the world of the first game and I would definitely recommend without a doubt. only issue is the amount of loading screens but they`re quick and personalized.
